title: Can't buy Pyke
body: So I can't see pyke in store and whenever I go to buy pyke through my "collections" tab it just send me to store home page with yet again no pyke? Is this normal and how long does it take to fix?

replies.body: how can i buy pyke? guys please tell me{{sticker:sg-shisa}}  8.11 patch has just released and i still cant find him on store
not released yet just been activated in code. hell be out midway through the patch
Most likely June 1, 2018, at 1:00 a.m. AEST.
> what is midway patch like couples days from now or what?
why put it in the collection (champions) if we can't buy it when i click on it i go to the store but pykes now there
Yeah we get it not on 31st but the 1st.. Real kick in the B's though.

Pyke will be released at the same time everywhere. As Seras Dragon mentioned, at 0100 tonight, see the [Curse of the Drowned](https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/learn-more-curse-drowned-event) event article for details.
He and the other skins will more than likely be released with the event. In other words June 1, 2018, at 1:00 a.m. AEST.
Yeh same - im wondering if its like draft pick where we dont get it until after a certain time?
